field.name: summary
field.value: ARDataBind's container test, clear and creation not general enough

field.name: description
field.value: IsContainer, ClearContainer and CreateContainer do not properly handle ICollection<> properties, so when binding an AR association is null if return type is ICollection<>. Currently only handles ISet and IList, should allow ICollection (NH doesn't currently handle the System ISet properly, but when it does, ARDataBind should also).

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: I just figured out why I was using ICollection<> rather than ISet<> or IList<> - with ICollection<> I can serialize collections without any special code. Now that I've made my model with ARDataBind, I can no longer serialize my objects just by setting [Serializable]. I realize that best practice is to have a serialization-friendly model which I map to and from for serialization, but that begs the question.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
